text: Floscopa scandens is a species of plant in the Commelinaceae family. It is a subscandent herb commonly found near streams and marshy localities in the forests of Western Ghats.http://florakarnataka.ces.iisc.ernet.in/hjcb2/img/pdf/Floscopa%20scandens/647.pdf.jpg ==References== Category:Herbs Category:Flora of the Western Ghats Category:Floscopa
title: Floscopa scandens
